faq1.question: 1. How can I reserve airport transfer?
faq1.answer: Click 'Send Reservation Request' on our website, fill out the form, or contact us via WhatsApp to make a reservation.

faq2.question: 2. What information is required for reservation?
faq2.answer: Flight information (flight code), arrival/departure airport, hotel/address information, number of passengers and passenger names are sufficient.

faq3.question: 3. What model are your vehicles?
faq3.answer: All our vehicles are luxury VIP Mercedes Vito. 6 passengers and 6 medium-sized suitcase capacity, comfortable and spacious interior.

faq4.question: 4. What languages do your drivers speak?
faq4.answer: Our drivers speak Turkish and English. Arabic-speaking driver can be arranged upon request.

faq5.question: 5. What happens if my flight is delayed?
faq5.answer: We track your flight number. In case of delay, your driver will wait for you, no extra charge.

faq6.question: 6. Is there a luggage limit?
faq6.answer: Each VIP vehicle has 6 passengers + 6 large suitcase capacity.

faq7.question: 7. What are the payment methods?
faq7.answer: We currently accept cash payment and IBAN transfer. Online credit card payment will be added soon.

faq8.question: 8. How long does the transfer take?
faq8.answer: Istanbul Airport-city center takes 40-60 minutes on average, Sabiha Gokcen-city center takes 60-90 minutes on average (varies according to traffic).

faq9.question: 9. Do you have meet & greet service?
faq9.answer: Yes, our driver meets you at the airport exit with a sign with your name.

faq10.question: 10. Can I make a last-minute reservation?
faq10.answer: Yes, you can make a reservation at least 1 hour before your flight.
